extension.dc:title: Web Links
extension.name: Links
extension.dc:subject: dwc:Occurrence dwc:Taxon
extension.dc:description: Links of related webpages. Links can be classified with keywords (dc:subject) and should point to human friendly webpages.

property.name: url
property.dc:description: The absolute URL to the related webpage

property.name: title
property.dc:description: An optional display label for the URL that the publisher may prefer be displayed with the link
property.examples: ARKive images of the Atlantic cod

property.name: subject
property.dc:description: keywords qualifying the link. Concatenation by semicolons recommended

property.name: description
property.dc:description: A descriptive human readable free text of the linked webpage.
property.examples: ARKive images of the Atlantic cod

property.name: language
property.dc:description: ISO 639-1 language code used on the related page.
